name: Skullcrusher

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff if the target's DEF is lower than this Champion's.

effects.notes: DEF-scaling single target damage. Damage Multiplier: 3.7 DEF.
Places a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff only if Skullcrusher's DEF is higher than target's DEF. Conditional placement, requires accuracy to land.

skills.book_value: Moderate priority - +20% damage total (5% × 4 books). Improves CB and dungeon damage output, not critical for his main role.
skills.notes: Heal Reduction is conditional - only applies if his DEF > target DEF. In CB/dungeon use, his high DEF usually meets this. Requires accuracy to land debuff even when condition is met. Books increase damage only, not debuff chance.

skills.name: Stonewall
skills.description: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Counterattack] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.

effects.notes: 50% [Ally Protection] on all allies EXCEPT himself. He takes 50% of all damage dealt to protected allies. Makes him the primary damage sponge.
[Counterattack] on all allies EXCEPT himself for 2 turns. THE SIGNATURE MECHANIC - enables team to counter every enemy AOE hit. Massive damage boost in CB and dungeons.
[Unkillable] on self for 1 turn. Ensures survival while tanking 50% of team damage via Ally Protection. Critical for CB stun absorption.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL - Must fully book A2 (5 books total). Reduces cooldown from 4→3 turns, enabling consistent counter uptime in CB/dungeons. Highest priority for booking.
skills.notes: THIS IS WHY SKULLCRUSHER IS S-TIER. Counterattack is the best offensive buff in the game for CB/dungeons. Combined with Ally Protection, he doubles team damage while protecting them. Unkillable prevents him from dying while tanking. MUST be booked to 3-turn CD for optimal CB/dungeon rotations. Speed tune carefully - he should go LAST before boss AOE to maximize counter duration.

skills.name: Unshakeable
skills.description: Decreases the duration of all debuffs on this Champion by 1 turn. Occurs once per turn.

effects.notes: Passive debuff cleanse - reduces duration of ALL debuffs on himself by 1 turn at the start of his turn. Effectively halves debuff duration.

skills.book_value: N/A - Passive abilities cannot be booked.
skills.notes: Critical for CB survivability. CB Stun, Decrease DEF, Decrease SPD all reduced by 1 turn immediately. Combined with high RES, makes him extremely hard to control. Synergizes with Resurgent mastery for full cleanse combo.

forms.aura: Increases Ally RESIST in Faction Crypts by 45.
forms.comments: Skullcrusher is THE budget Counterattack champion - best Epic alternative to Valkyrie/Martyr. His triple-buff kit (Ally Protection + Counterattack + Unkillable) makes him a one-champion team enabler for CB and dungeons. MUST be speed-tuned to go last before boss AOE to maximize buff uptime.

stat_priorities: DEF% primary (for damage scaling and survivability)
SPD for speed tuning (varies by comp - CB 171-191, Arena 200+)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: DEF% 3,000+, HP 45,000+, SPD 171-191 (comp dependent), RES 200+ (avoid stun), ACC 200-250 (optional for Heal Reduction). Focus on survivability - he tanks 50% of team damage via Ally Protection.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: DEF% 2,500+, HP 40,000+, SPD 180-200, RES 150+, ACC 200+ (for FK/Spider waves). Balance damage (DEF scaling) with survivability.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: DEF% 3,000+, HP 50,000+, SPD 200-250 (goes last to maximize counter duration), RES 300+ (tanky build), C.RATE 100%, C.DMG 200+ (if built as DEF nuker). Two builds viable: Tanky support or DEF nuker.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: DEF% 2,500+, HP 45,000+, SPD 180-200, RES 200+, ACC 250+ (boss debuffs). Similar to dungeons but higher RES/ACC for boss fights.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: DEF% 2,500+, HP 40,000+, SPD 170-190, RES 150+. Aura: +45 RES in Faction Crypts (excellent support aura).

recommended_gear: CLAN BOSS: Lifesteal + Speed (standard), or Lifesteal + Immortal (high sustain), or Stalwart + Immortal (reduce AOE damage). DEF% gloves/chest/boots OR SPD boots. HP% ring. DEF or HP amulet. RES or ACC banner. Substats: DEF%, HP%, SPD, RES. Speed tune 171-191 (slowest in team, goes right before boss AOE).

DUNGEONS: Lifesteal + Speed, or Bloodthirst + Speed (self-sustain), or Relentless (extra turns). DEF% gloves/chest, SPD boots. HP% ring. DEF amulet. ACC or RES banner. Substats: DEF%, HP%, SPD, ACC. Speed 180-200 for turn cycling.

ARENA DEFENSE: Stoneskin + Immortal (massive sustain), or Protection + Immortal (team damage reduction), or Immunity + Regeneration (anti-control). DEF% gloves/chest/boots. HP% ring. DEF amulet. RES banner (300+ total RES). Goes last to maximize counter duration.

ARENA OFFENSE: Speed + Defiant, or Savage + Speed (ignore DEF), or Critical Damage + Speed (nuker build). DEF% or C.DMG gloves (if 100% C.RATE from subs), DEF% chest, SPD boots. DEF ring. C.DMG amulet. ACC banner. DEF nuker build - scales damage from massive DEF stat.

NOTE: Lifesteal is critical for CB/dungeons - he tanks 50% of team damage via Ally Protection. Stalwart reduces AOE damage taken, synergizes perfectly. Always prioritize survivability (DEF%, HP%) over damage unless running DEF nuker build.

clan_boss: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (T6 - critical for damage)
Defense Tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Rejuvenation, Shadow Heal, Resurgent (removes CB stun combo with passive), Delay Death, Solidarity, Retribution (heal on debuff), Deterrence
Support Tree: AVOID Rapid Response and Arcane Celerity - they break speed tuning for CB comps. DO NOT take turn meter boost masteries.
dungeons: Offense Tree: Same as CB - Warmaster (T6) for boss damage
Defense Tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Rejuvenation, Shadow Heal (counters FK heal), Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution
Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy (if using Heal Reduction), Charged Focus, Rapid Response (OK for dungeons), Lore of Steel, Evil Eye, Lasting Gifts (extend counter duration)
arena: Offense Tree: Single Out, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster OR Helmsmasher (T6 - depends on build)
Defense Tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Rejuvenation, Shadow Heal, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence
Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel, Evil Eye, Master Hexer
doom_tower: Similar to dungeons - Warmaster, Defense tree focus, Shadow Heal for boss healing counters, Lasting Gifts for extended buffs
faction_wars: Similar to dungeons - balanced offense/defense with Warmaster. Aura: +45 RES in Faction Crypts makes him excellent faction support.
masteries.general: CRITICAL: For CB, DO NOT take Rapid Response or Arcane Celerity - they break speed tuning. For all content, Defense tree is essential due to Ally Protection damage tanking. Warmaster is T6 choice for all PVE content.

blessings: Cruelty (Debuffer) - increases debuff duration, synergizes with Heal Reduction
Brimstone (Tank) - reflects damage while tanking via Ally Protection
Polymorph (Arena defense) - clutch save mechanic when taking massive damage
Phantom Touch (CB/Dungeons) - extra debuff chance on A1

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior is generally good - prioritizes A2 (Stonewall) when off cooldown. No major AI issues reported. Safe for auto-play in CB and dungeons.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Counterattack comps (budget alternative to Valkyrie/Martyr unkillable teams)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Skullcrusher enables COUNTER-ATTACK CHEESE for Clan Boss and dungeons. His kit provides: 1) Counterattack buff (2 turns) = team counters every boss AOE = massive damage boost, 2) Ally Protection (50%, 2 turns) = centralizes damage on himself = easier to sustain team with one tank, 3) Unkillable (1 turn on self) = survives CB stun turn while tanking. SPEED TUNING REQUIRED: Skullcrusher must go LAST in turn order, right before boss AOE, to maximize counter buff uptime. Example CB comp: Skullcrusher (171 SPD, slowest) + 4 DPS/Poisoners (175-190 SPD) in Lifesteal. All counter-attack on every boss AOE = 2-3x damage output vs non-counter teams. ALTERNATIVES: Valkyrie (Legendary, better shields), Martyr (Legendary, better debuffs), but Skullcrusher is BEST EPIC for this role. Synergizes with: Multi-hitters (Coldheart, Fellhound for FK), Poisoners (Frozen Banshee, Deadwood Jedi), DEF-based DPS (Tayrel, Sepulcher Sentinel). AVOID: Champions that manipulate turn meter (breaks speed tune).

mechanics_advisory:
Skullcrusher is THE budget Counterattack champion and one of the best Epics in the game. His value:

1. CLAN BOSS (10/10): Enables 2-3x damage boost via Counterattack. Speed tune him to go LAST (171-191 SPD depending on comp) before boss AOE. Pair with poisoners/DPS in Lifesteal. Ally Protection + Unkillable lets him absorb stun safely. DO NOT FEED.

2. DUNGEONS (9/10): Counter-attack trivializes Fire Knight (team multi-hits on counter), Dragon (constant damage), Spider (counter AOE waves). His A1 DEF scaling adds good personal damage.

3. ARENA (9/10): Two builds viable - Ultra-tank (DEF%/HP%/RES, Stoneskin sets) or DEF nuker (C.RATE/C.DMG/DEF%, Savage sets). Goes last to maximize counter duration. Counters cleave teams.

4. FACTION WARS (8/10): Excellent Ogryn support. +45 RES aura in Crypts. Counter enables slow progression teams.

KEY SYNERGIES:
- Multi-hitters: Coldheart, Fellhound, Royal Guard (FK shield break)
- Poisoners: Frozen Banshee, Deadwood Jedi, Kael (CB damage)
- DEF-based DPS: Tayrel, Sepulcher Sentinel (scales with his buffs)
- Decrease ATK: Jareg, Tayrel, Coffin Smasher (reduces damage he tanks)

AVOID PAIRING WITH:
- TM manipulators in CB: High Khatun, Apothecary (breaks speed tune)
- Other Counterattack champions: Buffs don't stack, wasted slot

SPEED TUNING:
- CB Brutal/NM: 171-180 SPD (2:1 tune possible)
- CB UNM: 171-191 SPD (depends on comp, goes first OR last depending on strategy)
- Dungeons: 180-200 SPD (fast cycling)
- Arena: 200-250 SPD (goes last after setup)

BOOKING PRIORITY: A2 ONLY (5 books). Reduces cooldown 4→3 turns. A1 books are low priority (damage only). DO NOT FEED - he's irreplaceable until you get Valkyrie/Martyr.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Base stats already present in file (19,320 HP, 826 ATK, 1,189 DEF, 98 SPD) - validated as correct for level 60 Epic. No screenshot needed.

author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Skullcrusher is S-tier Epic and irreplaceable until Valkyrie/Martyr acquisition. Counterattack is the single most impactful buff for CB/dungeons. MUST be speed-tuned carefully (goes last before boss AOE). MUST fully book A2 for 3-turn cooldown. DO NOT FEED even if you pull duplicates - potential use for multiple team comps or second build (tank vs nuker). User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1) - Skullcrusher is CRITICAL for this content.

update_notes.last_patch: V8.00 (2023-12-12) - No mechanical changes, kit stable since original release. Skullcrusher is an OG champion.
